name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Accomplished Solutions Engineer with 8 years of experience in leveraging **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to architect and implement high-performance solutions tailored for the healthcare and financial sectors. I possess strong technical communication skills, operational experience in **API workflows**, and a deep understanding of **SaaS** technologies. My hands-on expertise also includes seamless integration with third-party tools like **Okta**, **Google Workspace**, and **Entra ID** to enhance user authentication and data workflow.

I excel in collaboration and problem-solving, contributing to high-impact teams by delivering robust applications that comply with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My technical acumen is supported by a solid foundation in **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with experience in CI/CD automation using platforms like **GitHub**, **BitBucket**, and **GitLab**.

With a commitment to continuous learning, I have developed a passion for machine learning and MLOps, building pipelines and solutions that incorporate predictive analytics and intelligent automation, utilizing tools like MLflow and Airflow. I bring analytical thinking and effective presentation skills to engage stakeholders in driving technology adoption and innovation.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to architect and develop scalable, full-stack healthcare and financial platforms ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, GDPR, and financial regulatory standards (e.g., PCI DSS, SOX).
Engaged in collaborative problem-solving and technical communication while developing and deploying cross-platform mobile applications using **Flutter** and **React Native** to enhance user experiences on iOS and Android platforms.
Implemented effective API workflows to ensure seamless integration between systems and services, including cloud services such as **Okta** for identity management.
Developed robust CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and **BitBucket**, ensuring quality through automated testing, security scans, and multi-environment deployments for both web and API services.
Led the transition from monolithic applications to microservices-based architectures leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes (EKS/AKS)**, which improved system availability by **99%**.
Designed and maintained cloud-native data architecture using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, enabling efficient storage and querying of large-scale healthcare and financial data, processing up to **1 million transactions** daily.
Integrated enterprise-level analytical features using **Tableau** and **Power BI Embedded** to deliver insightful data visualization tools, tracking transaction trends and operational KPIs in real-time.
Collaborated with teams to implement strategies for NLP models (using **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers**) to facilitate advanced healthcare document parsing and financial anomaly detection.
Used **continuous learning** to stay abreast of emerging technologies, enhancing skills in the latest frameworks and tools including **Apache Airflow** for MLOps pipelines.
Exhibited strong presentation skills through effective communication of complex technical concepts to stakeholders and team members.

Utilized **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure** to deliver scalable solutions with a focus on cloud services, ensuring robust infrastructure for financial platforms.
Demonstrated technical communication and collaboration skills by leading cross-functional teams in the modernization of financial platforms with a microservices-based architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing system scalability and maintainability for high-volume transactions.
Implemented API workflows to support seamless integration across various systems, ensuring real-time data availability and efficient operations.
Leveraged **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js** to build user-focused applications, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create responsive dashboards for financial analytics.
Developed and deployed real-time transaction monitoring dashboards using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, facilitating effective analytical thinking for anomaly detection in financial activity with the capability to handle data from **9** different sources.
Integrated messaging frameworks like **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to enhance event-driven architecture, allowing efficient asynchronous processing of **10 million** transactions daily and improving compliance workflows.
Built and orchestrated ETL pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, achieving batch and real-time ingestion of financial data with automation that reduced processing time by **40%**.
Designed and implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing historical transaction patterns to reduce false positives by **30%**.
Created ML pipelines for credit scoring and churn prediction, integrating model inference into backend services using **MLflow** for actionable insights, thereby facilitating continuous learning and problem-solving objectives.

Utilized **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure** cloud services to design and optimize backend solutions, ensuring seamless API workflows and high availability for a global e-commerce platform.
Leveraged **GitHub**, **BitBucket**, and **GitLab** for version control, fostering collaboration among development teams and enhancing continuous learning through shared knowledge.
Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills by engineering real-time features with **WebSockets**, utilizing **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** for event-driven architecture, resulting in a 30% improvement in order processing speed.
Applied technical communication skills to present complex data storage solutions using **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis**, improving fault tolerance and performance for high-traffic e-commerce workflows.
Integrated **Okta** for secure user authentication and implemented role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for GDPR compliance, enhancing data protection measures across the platform.
Collaborated cross-functionally to develop frontend applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, achieving a 25% reduction in page load times with optimized user interfaces and improved accessibility (WCAG 2.1).
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes**, enabling effective risk mitigation strategies and achieving a 40% reduction in deployment times during updates.
Conducted presentations to share insights on integrating AI/ML-based recommendation engines with **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, enhancing product listings and conversion rates using real-time behavioral data.
Built secure payment workflows using **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI compliance with a 100% success rate in transaction processing during peak traffic.
Engaged in continuous learning to stay abreast of new technologies and best practices, continually enhancing team capabilities and project outcomes.
